summary: A foundational area of mathematics where letters and symbols are used to represent numbers in equations.
why_important: It is the basis for almost all higher-level mathematics and is critical for problem-solving in many fields.

student_status.progress_comment: You've started, but there's a lot of ground to cover.

main_ideas.title: Variables and Constants
main_ideas.description: Understanding the difference between symbols that represent fixed values (constants) and those that can change (variables).

main_ideas.title: Solving Equations
main_ideas.description: Techniques for finding the value of an unknown variable that makes an equation true.

recommended_study_plan.title: Review Core Concepts
recommended_study_plan.description: Go over the definitions of variables, constants, expressions, and equations.

recommended_study_plan.title: Practice Problems
recommended_study_plan.description: Work through a variety of practice problems, starting with simple one-step equations and moving to more complex ones.

warnings: Don't forget to check your answers by plugging them back into the original equation.
